scenario_text.value:
Done... All taken care of. There weren’t that
many to begin with.

Think they were a coupla scouts? Maybe they
showed up to stop us from fighting.
The stars don’t just align like that, man.

Anyway, seems you’re back to your old self.
Ain’t heard that foul mouth on you in ages.

Oh me, oh my, but I wonder who might’ve been
raining on my parade this whole time?
Keep it up. You better not betray me.

When it comes to a fight, ain’t no one
a better match for me than your ugly ass.

So if...you say you ain’t gonna be a traitor,
I guess I can trust you. Maybe.

But if you do turn on us, you better expect
a knuckle sandwich.

...Pfft, we’ll see if I even feel it? That
soft little fist of yours, ya pushover.

Oh, I can give you a sample now if you keep
that talk up.

...Back in that fight, I felt it, man.
I really do wanna protect you, Kaito.

I get it—all the trash you talk is you trying
to cope with feelings that freak you out.

Sorry I can’t always pick up what you’re
putting down. I’ll do better next time.
